sledgehammer.lua

Class LuaTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.lua.LuaObject
        • sledgehammer.lua.LuaTable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Broadcast, ChatHistory, Color, Command, DiscordInformation, ModuleProperties, MongoLuaObject, Node, PeriodicMessage, PluginProperties, RequestChatChannels, RequestChatHistory, RequestDiscordInformation, RequestInfo, Send

    public abstract class LuaTable
extends LuaObject
    Abstract definitions class for KahluaTables.

    TODO: document.

    TODO: Redesign to pass KahluaTable through 'onExport()'. The current model is not efficient with data storage.
